Sentencas: Wind and solar power is troubled by large fluctuations in delivery due to changing weather.
Titulo: Hydrogen and synthetic fuel production using pressurized solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: The surplus electricity can be used in a Solid Oxide Electrolyzer Cell (SOEC) to split CO2 + H2O into CO + H-2 (+O-2).
Titulo: Hydrogen and synthetic fuel production using pressurized solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: The synthesis gas (CO + H-2) can subsequently be catalyzed into various types of synthetic fuels using a suitable catalyst.
Titulo: Hydrogen and synthetic fuel production using pressurized solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: As the catalyst operates at elevated pressure the fuel production system can be simplified by operating the SOEC at elevated pressure.
Titulo: Hydrogen and synthetic fuel production using pressurized solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: Here we present the results of a cell test with pressures ranging from 0.4 bar to 10 bar.
Titulo: Hydrogen and synthetic fuel production using pressurized solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: The cell was tested both as an SOEC and as a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Hydrogen and synthetic fuel production using pressurized solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: In agreement with previous reports, the SOFC performance increases with pressure.
Titulo: Hydrogen and synthetic fuel production using pressurized solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: The SOEC performance, at 750 degrees C, was found to be weakly affected by the pressure range in this study, however the internal resistance decreased significantly with increasing pressure.
Titulo: Hydrogen and synthetic fuel production using pressurized solid oxide electrolysis cells
